item.title: Npc
item.dc:creator: @Ollie Ollie
item.description:
@Ollie wrote:

why is he? he just asked a stupid question

by npc i assume you mean the arga chiken fight video
in this case
change this code to suit the current deobfuscation of the client:

public static boolean attackNPCByName(String npcName) {
    Class8_Sub3_Sub13_Sub1_Sub1 npc[] =	Class8_Sub3_Sub13.aClass8_Sub3_Sub13_Sub1_Sub1Array2606;
	for(int index = 0; index < npc.length; index++) {
		if(npc[index] == null) continue;
		Class8_Sub3_Sub17 npcdef = npc[index].aClass8_Sub3_Sub17_3227;
		if(npcdef == null) continue;
		String name = new String(npcdef.aClass3_2838.aByteArray1691);
		int npcid = npcdef.anInt2833;
		System.out.println("NPCName = " +name + " ID = " +npcid);
		if(name.equals(npcName)) {			
			int id = npcdef.anInt2833;
			action(3,0,0,34,index);
			return true;
		}	
	}
	return false;
   }

    public static void action(int menuID, int i, int i2, int i3, int i4)
    {
    	Class45.anIntArray1019[menuID] = i;
       	Class8_Sub11.anIntArray2002[menuID] = i2;
       	Class18.anIntArray406[menuID] = i3;
       	Class37.anIntArray855[menuID] = i4;
    	Class44.method785(142, menuID);
    }
